ALCHEMY.SuccessMessage: You have successfully completed the check!
ALCHEMY.NotReceiveItem: You did not receive an item, but you feel this is the correct recipe. Perhaps you lack the necessary skills?
ALCHEMY_TABLE.Warning_OnlyItems: Only items can be added to the alchemy table.
ALCHEMY_TABLE.Warning_OnlyInventoryItems: Only items from the character's inventory can be added to the alchemy table.
ALCHEMY_TABLE.Warning_NotEnoughItems: Not enough items in the character's inventory to add to the crafting table.
ALCHEMY_TABLE.Error_BadRecipe: It seems these ingredients cannot create a meaningful combination. Maybe try something else?
ALCHEMY_RECIPE.SuccessResultPlaceholder: Add an item for a successful result...
ALCHEMY_RECIPE.FailResultPlaceholder: Add an item for a failure result...
ALCHEMY_RECIPE.Warning_OnlyItems: Only items can be added to the recipe.
